price: [saying to themselves] “We feed you only for the sake of Allah; we seek from you neither reward nor gratitude.
arabic: إِنَّمَا نُطۡعِمُكُمۡ لِوَجۡهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَلَا شُكُورًا
